short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically groups the tab created from open link in new tab menu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Linked Tabs Grouper Functionalities:
- Auto-creates tab groups for managing tabs
- Keeps the two most recent tab groups active
- Shortcut for new adjacent tab: Alt+T
- Switch to newly created adjacent tab
